version_description:
Major update coming soon!
We are hearing your wishes and working hard to fulfill them.
If you have any request/issue write us contact@mayuapp.com
Prepare for mind blowing new animations!!

Major update coming soon!
We are hearing your wishes and working hard to fulfill them.
If you have any request/issue write us contact@mayuapp.com
Prepare for mind blowing new animations!!

OK, we've been waiting so long to tell you this!
let's start with video- yep, now you can take Video, actually, you can take multiple videos with our vine style camera.
- Upload video & images from your gallery
- Over 30 different text anim

iPhone X
Type Art now looks good on those super slick iPhone X screens.

NEW STYLES
We added 5 new styles which nicely round out the selection.

BUGS
We got rid of some little buggers, but as always please let us know if you find some

More Fonts, More Filters, fewer bugs.
Background colors for text are now available. click on the "drop" icon to toggle between colors.

1. Stickers, a bunch of them.
2. Add your Logo - you can now add your logo to your videos.
